version_description:
Another update with more improvements

- Now you can setup the news sources
- Ability to add notes to transactions
- Support for iPhone X OLED display optimized colors
- Few more under the hood fixes!
Minor improvements and convertor fixes

- KuCoin exchange API added
- CoinBase API added for syncing your balances
- New Saved Views for easier research
- New fun investment calculator
- Improved news section with the ability to add your own RSS sources
- Performance improvements

- Kraken API support for portfolio sync
- Hide Small Balances feature in Settings
- Fixed issues with HitBTC API
- More under the hood fixes

Urgent fix the previous version issue with Alerts

- Kraken API support for portfolio sync
- Hide Small Balances feature in Settings
- Fixed issues with HitBTC API
- More under the hood fixes

- Pump notification history page added
- News now easier to use and refresh
- Chart optimizations and fixes
- Hide Small Balances changed to 0.0001 BTC
- A lot of other optimizations and under the hood improvements

Urgent fix for previous update.

- Pump notification history page added
- News now easier to use and refresh
- Chart optimizations and fixes
- Hide Small Balances changed to 0.0001 BTC
- A lot of other optimizations and under the hood improvements

Huge improvement update!

- Deduct from holdings feature
- Now you can Select Exchange and Pair when adding a trade
- Portfolio will show the prices from your selected exchange
- Ability to set your trade fee
- Exchange API portfolios will show prices of that exchange
- Now Favorites reflect the exchange you selected
- Force Touch option to the Home screen coins for easier research
- A lot better Alerts!
- Now coin details page will update in realtime if you selected an exchange
- Security updates for exchange API sync
- New wallet watchers for Siacoin, XRP, Litecoin, NEO, Dash aaaaand DeepOnion (thanks to their active community)
- A lot of under the hood fixes and improvements

Few quick improvements and fixes to the previous big update.

- We got back the headers in favorites
- Now Saved Views support more columns on landscape mode and iPad!
- You can sort your portfolio columns
- Bug fixes

Huge improvement update!

- Deduct from holdings feature
- Now you can Select Exchange and Pair when adding a trade
- Portfolio will show the prices from your selected exchange
- Ability to set your trade fee
- Exchange API portfolios will show prices of that exchange
- Now Favorites reflect the exchange you selected
- Force Touch option to the Home screen coins for easier research
- A lot better Alerts!
- Now coin details page will update in realtime if you selected an exchange
- Security updates for exchange API sync
- New wallet watchers for Siacoin, XRP, Litecoin, NEO, Dash aaaaand DeepOnion (thanks to their active community)
- A lot of under the hood fixes and improvements

Bug fixes and improvements to the previous update.

- Fixed notification center widget issues some users experiencing
- We got back rankings in favorites

- A lot of under the hood fixes and improvements
- Hide Portfolio feature for fun

- Force touch improvements
- Favorites are now syncing between your devices
- A lot of other improvements and fixes

Another update will lots of improvements and new features

- Now you can see all of your portfolios in one page
- Ability to Export your transactions in CSV file (Unlimited Pro Only)
- Now the coins will be listed on Coin Stats immediately
- Improvements on some wallets (now you can see all tokens on your NEO wallet)
- Portfolio Pie Chart made better
- Ability to receive notifications for new exchange listings
- Coin Stats Score (Unlimited Pro Only)
- As always, a lot more improved.
Minor fixes and improvements to the previous version mainly connected to the new listed coins.
Added v1 of Apple Watch app!

- Now you can set alerts for ALL coins.
- Bug fixes on deduct from holdings feature
- Other other the hood improvements and fixes.
More fixes and improvements.

It took a bit longer than expected but it worth it! Welcome Coin Stats version 1.5!

- New Alerts screen with new Alerts options including Volume and Total Market Cap alerts
- Better Coin Details screen with News about the specific cryptocurrency
- New Saved Views for easier use
- Now you can filter and order by Coin Stats Score (PRO ONLY)
- Yes! 24 hour profit/loss and better portfolio chart
- New Markets Section so you can know where the coin is being traded on

Unfortunately we had to remove badge icon price because it was agains Apple developer guidelines. Sorry about that.

Bug fixes and small improvements to the previous version.

Welcome Coin Stats version 1.5.0!
- New Alerts screen with new Alerts options including Volume and Total Market Cap alerts
- Better Coin Details screen with News about the specific cryptocurrency
- New Saved Views for easier use
- Now you can filter and order by Coin Stats Score (PRO ONLY)
- Yes! 24 hour profit/loss and better portfolio chart
- New Markets Section so you can know where the coin is being traded on

Unfortunately we had to remove badge icon price because it was agains Apple developer guidelines. Sorry about that.
Minor fixes and improvements

Another exciting update from Coin Stats.

- Huobi Pro and Bitso exchanges has been added as a portfolio sync option
- Multi window support for iPad makes the usage a lot easier
- More UI cleanups fixes and improvements.
More fixes and improvements
Bug fixes

Another big new update with lots of improvements and new features.

* RSI indicators for cryptocurrency lists
* You can share your portfolio with your friends and family
* Profile page
* A lot more improvements for easy portfolio tracking

Improvements to the previous version.

* RSI indicators for cryptocurrency lists
* You can share your portfolio with your friends and family
* Profile page
* A lot more improvements for easy portfolio tracking

Exciting milestone hit for Coin Stats.
We’re updating the Coin Stats app with new improvements and a better-looking UI.

Here is the list of improvements
- ICO support - now you can add custom coins to your portfolio
- Improved portfolio sharing - you can share your portfolio with your friends
- Easier exchange selection for the coin
- Again, completely new UI and feel.

Please check it out and send us your feedback at support@coinstats.app

Bug fixes and improvements to previous big update.

Here is the list of improvements

- Improved portfolio sharing - you can share your portfolio with your friends
- Easier exchange selection for the coin
- Again, completely new UI and feel.

Please check it out and send us your feedback at support@coinstats.app

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

What?! Transaction history support is already there? Yes!!! We are super excited to introduce another major update that is ready for download!

Here is what’s new in 2.1.0:
- Transaction history synced from Binance, Bittrex and KuCoin! It will now scan all your past and future transactions for more precise profit/loss.
- VET and ETC wallets have been added as a wallet sync options.
- Coin pages now represent their brand colors!

Enjoy and let us know what you think via our communities:

support@coinstats.app
twitter.com/coinstatsapp
facebook.com/coinstats/
t.me/coinstatsapp
问题修复与改进

New and exciting update of Coin Stats is ready for download! Get it now to enjoy these incredible new features:

*Portfolio stats feature for connected exchange accounts.
*Now you can see you how much fees you've paid to an exchange, how much you deposited and withdrew in your lifetime and much more!
*Presenting Media News to keep you updated on trending crypto news in videos as well.
*Bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, your feedback is welcomed to help us create a better experience for you and for all of our users!
Bug fixes and improvements

We're super excited to announce the launch of Coin Stats Direct in our new 2.2.0 version!

- Exclusive chat between verified investors and teams
- Spam and scam less community

As always, your feedback is very welcomed!

We're super excited to announce the launch of Coin Stats Direct in our new 2.2.1 version!

- Exclusive chat between verified investors and teams
- Spam and scam less community

As always, your feedback is very welcomed!
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

If you're one of those waiting for "Exchanges" in Coin Stats, then our first 2019 release is tailor-made for you! ;-)
Update now and discover these new features:

- New Exchanges screen and exchange details!

Over 200 exchanges listed with useful and handy information such as volume, rank, pairs being traded and much more!

As always, enjoy and let us know what you think!

Yes! We came up with another charming update of Coin Stats.
Here is what can be unpacked in Version 2.3.1:

- Orders - Your open orders can now be tracked in beautifully integrated separate section in your portfolio. It’s now available for Binance only, but will be added for more exchanges in due course!

- Fill Notification - Pro users can also be instantly notified when their orders are filled.

Download now and have your finger on the pulse of your active orders!
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

-New and easier to use home screen layout and even more improvements!
-Better Team Updates.
Now you can share your portfolio with public link with the option to hide your balances.

- New candle charts for global average prices
- Apple watch complications
- We are thrilled to announce Ledger hardware wallets integration as well!

- New candle charts for global average prices
- Apple watch complications
- Ledger hardware wallets integration

Another big update coming to CoinStats!

- Quick Trade feature! Yes! Now you can submit a simple swap trades between your coins on your exchange portfolios.
- ArkaneNetwork integration - You can connect and manage your Arkane Network Bitcoin, Ethereum and Vechain wallets fully from CoinStats app
- Ubnormal volume exchanges are being marked now.
- Apple Watch Series 4 support.

Bug fixes and improvements to the previous HUGE update.

- Quick Trade feature! Yes! Now you can submit a simple swap trades between your coins on your exchange portfolios.
- ArkaneNetwork integration - You can connect and manage your Arkane Network Bitcoin, Ethereum and Vechain wallets fully from CoinStats app.
- Ubnormal volume exchanges are being marked now.
- Apple Watch Series 4 support.

- New comparison charts for coin prices and portfolio between fiat, BTC and ETH.
- Minor improvements and fixes.

- Added CoinStats Insights giving our users aggregated view of CoinStats portfolios. You will love that!
- Crypto trading polls added!
- Haptic feedback for your actions on newer iOS devices.
- Apple Watch Ticker Update time improvements.
- White mode colors made a bit more readable.
- More fixes and improvements, as always!

- Crypto trading polls added!
- Haptic feedback for your actions on newer iOS devices.

- White mode colors made a bit more readable.
- More fixes and improvements, as always!

- New historical charts for CoinStats Insights
- More improvements in coin details and your holdings
- More fixes and other improvements

Improvements and bug fixes to the latest update.
- New historical charts for CoinStats Insights
- More improvements in coin details and your holdings
- More fixes and other improvements

We’re having a blast with 2.7.0 version of CoinStats! Welcoming these absolutely awesome new features:

- New cleaner portfolio UI
- New profit/loss options for coins - including more extensive calculations of P/L such as all time, last 24h, last trade and current holdings!
- Now you can view the insight chart with the respective coin!
- Portfolio Profit/Loss can already be displayed per chosen graph interval (24h/1w/1m/...)
- Transaction notifications are added for portfolios in addition to order fill notifications
- Now all currencies can be selected as “bought with” when adding a custom coin
- And as always, we squashed some bugs, made UI and performance improvements!

Download, enjoy and share your impressions with us!

Minor fixes and improvements to previous big update.

We’re having a blast with 2.7.0 version of CoinStats! Welcoming these absolutely awesome new features:

- New cleaner portfolio UI
- New profit/loss options for coins - including more extensive calculations of P/L such as all-time, last 24h, last trade, and current holdings!
- Now you can view the insight chart with the respective coin!

Download, enjoy and share your impressions with us!

Unpack and enjoy the following improvements & changes in the newest CoinStats version 2.7.3:

- Portfolio total price text color in light mode bug fix
- Invisible profit/loss bug fix
- Decreased row and graph heights in the portfolio
- Optimized portfolio performance
- Dark mode color change animation
- UI improvements and fixes

- Ability to password lock Portfolio only, instead of the entire application

Welcoming heavy dose of empowering features in the newest CoinStats V3!

- Big redesign! Making CoinStats more elegant and clean.
- You can BUY coins now with your Apple Pay or Debit Card. (USA ONLY for now)
- More trading features
- Ability to create CoinStats Wallet
- Ability to receive/send coins to/from your CoinStats Wallet (Send to your connected exchange account with one click!)
- New Chart style with separated Volume chart
- Support for iOS Dark more
- New much better list of Transactions with filters and cleaner look.
- News open with Safari Reader View now
- Portfolio performance improvements
- Squashed all known bugs

Enjoy and share your feedback with us!

Futures exchange tracking integration is finally here!

Starting from Binance Futures and Bitmex

* Track your open positions

We'd love to hear your feedback at support@coinstats.app

When you’re managing your crypto, app performance and stability matters. CoinStats is more reliable than ever. This update contains lots of improvements and bug fixes

We upgrade CoinStats frequently to improve your crypto managing experience. 
Now CoinStats is more reliable than ever. 
This update contains lots of improvements and bug fixes.
